column1: Master in Leadership in Digitalised Organisations
column5: Are you active, curious and have a drive for change? Prepare for a leading role in the transition to Industry 4.0. You’ll learn to lead, develop and organise digital change within business and industry. As a leader, you’ll facilitate ongoing and inclusive learning and collaboration. Your English-taught programme is founded on the principals of work integrated learning. You’ll build hands-on experience in how knowledge is created, disseminated and implemented sustainably in digitalised
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
